post.title: VTuber Design Book at Comiket 100 Sold Out
post.content:
The 100th edition of Japan's popular Comic Market (Comiket) happened just last weekend, and among the various books sold at the fan event of the summer is a VTuber Design Book featuring more than 800 assets for various VTuber activities created by 98 designers.

The book is divided into three parts: Design Samples, Design Wisdom and Design Materials, all done with a vision to improve the quality of VTuber designs in general. Physical copies of the book sold out at Comiket 100 in just a few hours.

A total of 245 supporters backed the project on Campfire for a total of around 1.2 million yen, which 305% of its 400,000-yen goal. The digital version is still available on BOOTH and Melonbooks.

Photo: Okuri Sae on Twitter

post.description: The 100th edition of Japan\'s popular Comic Market (Comiket) happened just last weekend, and among the various books sold at the fan event of the summer is a **VTuber Design Book** featuring more than 800 assets for various VTuber activities created by 98 designers.

node.description: Popular Hololive English VTuber Mori Calliope has released a music video for her track ‚ÄúLet‚Äôs End The World‚Äù. The song is produced by Vocaloid producer Giga-P and popular Japanese music producer TeddyLoid.
